name: Floors Experiment
description:
'Floors' is a fully AI-generated experimental software that adapts to the way you perform actions and gestures within the program.

To flee from the memories, you must first find them.

Know that she's watching. Don't let your eyes deceive you when you feel like you saw something behind that wall. If you hear something, try to hear for it again. This was made to test, not to pleasure. She built these floors with you. Don't underestimate her.

Use headphone to be truly apart of the official experiment.

Thank you for testing.

Controls -
WASD > Walk.

RMB - Bread crumb trail.
